item.title: Carrie add a quote by Mark Helprin
Carrie add a quote by Laini Taylor
item.description: "Skip meeting him? The butterflies, the pounding heart, the blushing? The part where you enter each other's magnetic fields for the first time, and it's like invisble lines of energy are drawing you together-" -- Laini Taylor
